NSOperation * operation

Detailed Description

DKDeferredOperation

Wraps the execution of a DKCallback in an NSOperation and callbacks with the function's return value. Operations are not started upon creation of this object. You must add [d operation] to an NSOperationQueue or call [[d operation] start].
